mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_HIT, B.CREATE_DT, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_NO FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN USER_T U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY B.CREATE_DT DESC

SELECT DISTINCT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_HIT, B.CREATE_DT, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_NO, C.CMT_NO, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.CREATE_DT FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN USER_T U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN COMMENT_T C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CMT_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY B.CREATE_DT DESC, C.CREATE_DT DESC
